NAME: Harbinger Class Ship
DESC: Enemy - When defeated the player gains another shield surge.
ALERT_TEXT: You've recovered a Shield Surge Device in the wreckage of a Harbinger Class Ship!

NAME: Command Core
DESC: When defeated it changes E15 from active to inactive.
ALERT_TEXT: You've captured the Command Core and overloaded the Extinction Engines!

NAME: Local Warlord
ALERT_TEXT: You've defeated the Local Warlord and revealed the location of the Command Core!

NAME: Extinction Engine
DESC: Has two states (active and inactive).  When active it takes 100 damage. When inactive it gives 3 parts.

NAME: Rebel Stash
DESC: When captured the player gains another shield surge.
ALERT_TEXT: You've recovered a Shield Surge Device in a Rebel Stash!

NAME: Trader Ship
DESC: When defeated it reveals the E05 and E08 ships
